settings.title: Join The Team
settings.content: We are looking for energetic, eager-to-learn, everyday outdoorsy individuals to be a part of our team! We are a family-owned, outdoor outfitter serving a community of adventurers. If you or someone you know could be a good fit for what we offer, please come in and pick up an application or print one below.

settings.title: Available Positions
settings.html:
Specialty Sales Associate

Job Type: Full-time or part-time

Good Sports Outdoor Outfitters is currently seeking enthusiastic, energetic and friendly individuals to join our team. Good Sports is a 41 year old, and growing, specialty retailer in the outdoor industry. We sell name brands like Patagonia, The North Face, Asics, Brooks, and several other pinnacle brands in our industry. Good Sports is a family owned and family run company and values its employees first and foremost.

We are looking to add a full or part-time team player to our sales staff. An interest and experience in the outdoors (hiking, camping. climbing, etc.), athletic training, and/or snow sports as well as the fashion industry is a must.

Paired with retail experience, successful candidates should have the ability to perform the following duties and responsibilities:

  • Desire to greet all guests with a genuine/authentic smile and personalized offer to help with their shopping needs when appropriate.
  • Ability to reference, share, and apply product knowledge information on an ongoing basis.
  • Have knowledge of some outdoor sports.
  • An outgoing and amicable attitude. Relationship building is important.
  • An understanding of the brands and trends we sell.
  • A general knowledge of computer use
  • Have the ability and desire to learn quickly.
  • Honest, reliable, and dependable.
  • Possess fashion merchandising knowledge and experience.
  • Drive to meet and exceed performance expectations and goals
  • Drive branding and business objectives/sales through excellent execution of visual merchandising and presentation.
  • Ability to utilize all company tools, visual talent, and knowledge to plan, map, and execute floor sets incorporating appropriate store specific adaptations as necessary.
  • Ability to work in partnership with store management, continually analyze and respond to business/selling trends, assortment needs, and guest feedback--proactively adapt merchandising as needed.

Good Sports is a great place to work and offers:

  • Simple IRA plan including matching
  • Associate discount
  • Paid vacation
  • Flexible schedule

Schedule:

  • Monday to Friday
  • Weekends

Supplemental Pay:

  • Commission pay

Education:

  • High school or equivalent (Preferred)

Experience:

  • Customer service: 1 year (Required)

Pay: From $10.00 per hour

Purchase Order/Inventory Assistant/Retail Associate

Job Type: Full-time

We are currently seeking enthusiastic, energetic, and friendly individual to join our team. We are a specialty outdoor retailer looking to fill a full-time Purchase Order/Inventory Assistant/Retail Associate.

An interest in the outdoors, athletic training, snow sports, as well as the fashion industry is a must.

Duties for this position include, but are not limited to:

  • Cover retail outlet store (when open)
  • Desire to greet all guests with a genuine/authentic smile and personalized offer to help with their shopping needs when appropriate
  • Ability to reference, share, and apply product knowledge information on an ongoing basis.
  • Input purchase orders with detail to style #'s, color, pricing, etc.
  • Assist with reconciling accounts payable invoices/receivers
  • Create and maintain Excel spreadsheets
  • Managing inventory
  • Performing cycle counts
  • Updating inventory count and maintaining inventory
  • Reporting discrepancies in inventory

Qualifications:

  • Have great attention to detail
  • Possess problem solving, attention to detail, and multi-tasking
  • Demonstrate excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Have great customer service skills
  • Have computer, software, and internet knowledge including Excel and Word
  • Be reliable and dependable
  • Inventory and/or purchase order experience helpful

Experience:

  • order entry: 1 year (Preferred)
  • customer service: 1 year (Preferred)

Education:

  • High school or equivalent (Preferred)

Benefits:

  • 401(k) matching
  • Employee discount
  • Paid time off

Starting Pay:

  • From $13.00 per hour

Warehouse Shipping Clerk

Job Type: Full-time

Tasks can include but not limited to:

  • Preparing parcels for mailing/shipping
  • Pulling customer orders from stock
  • Assist shipping and receiving, unloading trucks, checking in merchandise
  • Reading customer orders or shipping orders to determine items to be moved, gathered, or distributed and/or shipped
  • Sorting and placing materials or items on racks, shelves, or in bins according to predetermined sequence such as size, type, style, color, or product code
  • Recording amounts of materials or items received
  • Assisting in counting of physical inventory
  • Organizing warehouse and work area for orderliness at all times
  • During seasonal/busy times, extended hours may be required
  • During slow shipping and receiving times, may be asked to assistant with internet listings (eBay, Amazon, Good Sports.com)

Physical Requirements:

  • Required to stand; walk; and stoop, kneel, crouch or crawl
  • Must regularly lift and/or move up to ten pounds and occasionally lift and/or move more than one hundred pounds

Good Sports is a great place to work and offers:

  • Simple IRA plan including matching
  • Associate discount
  • Paid vacation

Schedule:

  • Monday to Friday
  • Weekends

Valid driver’s license and good driving record required.

Strong organization, multi-tasking, versatility, communication, and attention to detail skills will be required.

Must be dependable and reliable.

*COVID-19 Precaution(s): Personal protective equipment provided or required, social distancing guidelines in place, and sanitizing, disinfecting, or cleaning procedures in place.

Internet Assistant

Job Type: Full-time

Available to work in office*Full Time M-F 9:00am-5:00pm & Saturdays 9:45am-1:00pm*

Good Sports Outdoor Outfitters is looking for a full time Data Entry/Internet Assistant to assist with their internet department, and you may have just the skill set and mentality needed to fill this role! We are looking for a tech savvy individual to join our team and assist in product listing and customer service primarily for eBay, but also for other websites. You will be responsible for creating product listings and refining content.

Requirements:

  • Must be very detailed oriented.
  • Must have excellent computer skills including exposure of e-commerce sites like Amazon, eBay, and others.
  • Must have exceptional grammar skills-able to spell accurately and write succinct yet detailed listings.
  • Must be proficient in Excel.
  • Experience listing items online is preferred but not necessary.
  • Ability to deal with customers via email and phone.
  • Have the ability and desire to learn quickly.
  • Honest, reliable, and dependable.
  • Must be able to work independently as well as within a team.

Duties:

  • List new products primarily to company website, but also may assist with Amazon and eBay as well as other sales channels.
  • Answer phone calls and emails concerning customer questions and/or concerns about orders.
  • Photograph items to be listed online.
  • Use a software program to list items for sale online.

Qualifications:

  • High school or equivalent (Required)
  • Must work well with others

Benefits:

  • 401(k) matching
  • Employee discount
  • Paid time off

Starting Pay:

  • From $12.00 per hour

settings.subheading: Please fill out pages 1 & 2 in either format and email back to us.
